name: Red-Eyes Collision Dragon
text:
2+ DARK Dragon monsters
When this card is Link Summoned: Inflict damage to your opponent equal to half of the original ATK of "Red-Eyes" monsters this card points to. While this card points to a monster, it cannot be destroyed by battle. If this card is sent from the field to the GY by an opponent's card (by battle or card effect): Add 1 "Red-Eyes" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Red-Eyes Collision Dragon" once per turn.
